item.title: Using Python crontab correctly
item.description: In this post, we are going to examine thoroughly how to setup python-crontab correctly and debugging for possible errors and how to resolve them. For the uninitiated, python-crontab is a python package for editing cron table aka crontab used for scheduling the jobs run by cron. I have setup a cron job which runs for every hour. I have a file every_hour.py that contains the following code and sets up crontable entry to run cron.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, Welcome to my site. I am a Software consultant and open-source developer living in Pune, India. In this website you may find articles about Python, rust and some other stuff. The list of projects I have contributed to: Django Ipython pytest CPython - (Python programming language). Rust - Programming language. MongoMock - In-memory mocking library for MongoDB with minimal feature set. Cargo - Rust package manager. Pandas - Python data manipulation library.

item.title: Contact
item.description: You can contact me at thatiparthysreenivas@gmail.com

item.title: Hire Me
item.description: You can hire me for your python/Django projects. Or as a python/rust engineer. I can write production ready code in both the languages. I have experience with designing automation frameworks too.

item.title: Projects
item.description: allhub - Allhub is a client to connect to Github REST API v3. soduku - Sudoku solver in Python - 2010ish euler - Project Euler solutions rust-bloomfilter - Bloom filter written in rust companies-list - Fortune 1000 companies details scraped from fortune website. Written in Typescript using puppeteer library.
